extendedInfo.description: Police Scanner 5-0 brings you more than 2,500 police, fire, rescue and other radio feeds over 3G or WiFi. You can search for channels in the U.S. and other countries by country, state or province and county. Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G/WiFi triangulation. You can save your favorites, listen in the background, and get instant access to new feeds as they come online. Use Police Scanner to monitor exciting police, fire, and rescue frequencies, stay abreast of these activities in your area, and be prepared for disasters or other emergency situations. â It's like Jersey Shore, but not really. â Whether you like reality shows or hate them, you'll love listening in on real police, fire and rescue communications. Police Scanner Radio brings you more than 2,000 channels including public safety, air traffic, marine and amateur short-wave frequencies, all easily searchable. â Find sources close to you. â When you could hear your neighbors yelling over your own TV, you knew what they were up to. It's when they suddenly got quiet that you had to wonder. No more! With Police Scanner Radio, you'll know as soon as the authorities do! â Never boring! â Find channels with the most activity and listeners. Search U.S. feeds by state and county. Also search international feeds using Police Radio.Roger, Porkchop. Whut's yer 20? Learn new words, and new ways of combining familiar words. We were going to list this in the Education category, but everyone laughed. So here it is in News. Seriously, though, check out the features: Critical Hit Software LLC makes no claim of any kind about the availability of any specific communications channel, frequency or data feed. Feeds are added and removed from time to time outside the control of Critical Hit Software LLC. Please see http://criticalhitsoftware.com/scanner_feeds.php for a sample list of feeds. FEATURES â More than 2,500 radio feeds delivered to you over 3G or WiFi â Simple, intuitive screens â Search U.S. and international channels by country, state and county â Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G triangulation â Save your favorite channels â Listen in the background as you use other apps â "10 Codes" and CB Lingo â Get instant access as new feeds come online

reviews.title: Great for the money.
reviews.comment: For $2.00 bucks u get a very good app. I would given it 5 stars if it had more frequencies.
reviews.author: William Hazlett

reviews.title: Almost equal to my scanner radio
reviews.comment: Except for the fact that it can only scan a specific frequency, it is the best alternative to know what is happening in my home city while even abroad. Works even on digital frequencies. Well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool Scanner
reviews.comment: Easy to use, sound is excellent. Great fun tool.
reviews.author: Steven Whyte

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Very cool. Works perfect. Fun to listen to on road trips.
reviews.author: Ej Chijimatsu

reviews.title: Good police scanner app
reviews.comment: Has a large number of channels and works well once you pay the $2.  It does time out which is annoying but it takes a long while for that to happen.
reviews.author: Curtis Halford

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love it but will only give five stars until you fix the time out. I don\'t want to have to keep going back in and restarting it!
reviews.author: Chad Van Der Linden

reviews.title: Great audio
reviews.comment: I own the other top one. But this app has way better audio.   It actually sounds very close to my PSR-500. And it also has my Police & Fire  Dept. And I like the layout and over all look\'s better & audio is clear. I take no side\'s because I do own the other one with more frequencies. Still 5*
reviews.author: Larry F

reviews.title: No complaints
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty good but I can\'t find liberty country in Texas. Other than that it a good scanner...
reviews.author: Alex Grace

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Only improvement I can recommend is adding district 3 of saint Louis county. This app is so easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could do with more UK channels
reviews.comment: A good app. If your keeping up with American police - but all other locations are usually silent. Also if you live outside the US the \"find my nearest station\" only finds US channels kind of a long way if you live in Germany.
reviews.author: warren simpson

reviews.title: Good for Chicagoans - UK Zero coverage
reviews.comment: I do like like this app, and even listen to the US coverage for entertainment. But UK coverage would add Soo much more local interest around London, .. If any uk police/fire transmitters listed I\'ll be back and give a 5.. Otherwise limited use or entertainment.
reviews.author: Tao de B

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would be alot better if I was able to listen to county scanner on one speaker and the city on the other (ear buds) and not have to hear them both at the same time. Separation of the two would make it easier to follow. Other then that good job!
reviews.author: David Medina

reviews.comment: I found it amusing, but DOUBT, that there\'s so little going on. Plenty of conversations missed, and few channels caught
reviews.author: Jason Hainsworth

reviews.title: Joewelch19@gmail. com
reviews.comment: Keeps telling me radio failure everytime I want to listen it\'s crap I can\'t believe I pay for this s***
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m  having  major network problems. This app has worked perfectly until a few days ago. Would you please take a look at it and see what you can do.\tVery good app. It works just as described in the description. I\'m enjoying it very much. I can listen to my mom when she\'s on duty. For the price you can\'t beat it.
reviews.author: Cathy Petzold

reviews.title: Thanks Excellent. Programme.  A must for any swl / radio ham
reviews.comment: Deserves the 5 star rating even 10 star if they had that many. Got this on all my stuff.  KGM.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App.
reviews.comment: Not apps fault, lose contact when police jump channels, but everything else with app is 5 star.
reviews.author: Ron Cox

reviews.title: Worth the $
reviews.comment: I was amazed to find feeds for my town and the surrounding region. Clear stream and easy controls. Overall a freakin sweet app.
reviews.author: Adam Brouillard

reviews.title: Great app keeps me up to date on where the cops are
reviews.comment: After swinging and missing with a few other apps claiming to be the best on the market. I have finally found the best scanner app, would recommend to anyone anytime.
reviews.author: Demien Osborn

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Being a police officer, I use this app daily in my patrol car. It has helped out many times by hearing what is going on in neighboring agencies and not recieving a bolo after the fact.
reviews.author: Jason Hancock
